page.title: 07RECREATION
page.content:
CHILDRENS RECREATIONAL INTERESTS.
In our area a survey into childrens interests showed the following.About one third liked to collect things.Over a half were intrested in sport.About three quarters liked T.V.Roughly one quater listen to the radio.Half like to read and the other half have an interest in dancing over half said they liked and had computers. ADULT INTERESTS. Well over half have a particular interest or hobby.More than half collect things.Some take part in a sport and a few go to watch sport live. The same number go to a sport or hobby club in this area.One in twenty go regulary to the cinema,about half go occsionally and one in five never go.
